title: Interesting!
review: Bought several paintings on rock art from the personal collection of the artist.Definitely worth a visit.

title: Good
review: A good place to visit for art and history lovers. Got some stuffs for myself. Would recommend it for art lovers.

title: Museum of Culture
review: Another intresting place in Bhimtal is the museum of folk culture housing collections of folk paintings and ancient wooden artifacts.Here through the efforts of Dr.Mathpal a rich collection of the cultural and archeological items have been made . These artifacts from the Uttarakhand region gives you an insight into the cultural heritage of this area.Tourist can buy replicas of his paintings.

title: Unique place
review: One of unique place for art lover. Some painting are very good one. Need maintenance. Had entrance fee.

title: Place for Art Lovers
review: I never thought ot have place like this. Got good collection of art work and paintings, Worth visiting place, You can buy paintings from there. Need to buy ticket ti enter the place

title: Folk Museum
review: This museum is a need to go to region of Bhimtal. Popularly known as "Lok Sanskriti Sangrahalaya" this non-public  museum turned into founded by way of Dr Yashodhar Mathpal,  international famed archaeologist, artist, scholar and logician Padmshree,  in 1983, Dr Yashodhar Mathpal hail's from "Manila" a small city in Almora District  in Uttarakhand. Musuem gift treasured artifacts and a treasure of old photo.  The museum became set up with the primary goal of upkeep of neighborhood subculture, documentation of oral and written traditions and provision of presenting schooling on vanishing arts and crafts of the vicinity  if you need recognize about Uttarakhand people culture one must visit.

title: Know place in depth
review: If want to know more about traditions, culture, rituals and past of the state than this is place for visit. Also known as Folk cultural museum

title: Personal Collection of Dr Mathpal
review: This is a museum displaying a personal collection of Dr Mathpal like his paintings and High-end wood sculptures. If you are a art lover then you must go there else give it a pass

title: One Man's Labour of Love
review: Dr Suresh Mathpal's Museaum and Art Gallery in Bhimtal is a must visit place, though not many people seem to know about it. Dr Mathpal has painstakingly collected artifacts from all over Kumaon and set up a phenomenal gallery of them. The second gallery is unique, where he has recreated a large number of cave paintings from all over India. A must visit if you are in Bhimtal.

title: to know the living folk art
review: This is a true living folk art museum. Mr Yashodhar Mathpal, the man behind the museum is an artist and worked with the archaeology department of M.P for many years.

title: Nice museum
review: The Museum of Folk Culture of Bhimtal is also known as Lok Sanskriti Sangrahalaya. The visitors can see some precious artefacts along with a huge collection of photographs. Various archaeological items and rock arts are also exhibited in the museum, which was founded with the sole aim to preserve the rich culture of Uttarakhand. Tourists can also see folk paintings, wooden artefacts, ancient manuscripts, images of god and goddesses, agricultural implements and costumes

title: An excellent, informative museum and rock art gallery.
review: This is an amazing collection of folk culture and rock art -- all the more remarkable as it is the work of one dedicated and knowledgeable expert in the field, Dr Yashodhar Mathpal. It was by chance that we saw museum board flash by and stopped, as our taxi driver was driving past it. Apparently not many people visit this.
